caption.title: Phylogenetic tree of selected RVFV segments: (A) small (S), (B) medium (M) and (C) large (L).
caption.p: Analysis at nucleic acid level with sequences available in GenBank. The tree was generated by the neighbor-joining method with Geneious software for Mac (Geneious version 6.1 created by Biomatters) by the boostrapping approach with 1000 replicates. Values are showed as percentages.
